subject: p17206933
History: -year-old male with altered mental status and history of CHF with concern for pneumonia. Evaluate for interval change.
Findings: Since, there has been continued progressive consolidation involving the left lung with asymmetric opacification distributed throughout the right hemithorax most compatible with multifocal pneumonia. There are superimposed areas of bibasilar atelectasis. There are no pleural effusions or pneumothorax. The cardiomediastinal and hilar contours are stable, with the heart borderline enlarged. There is tortuosity and atherosclerotic calcification within the thoracic aorta.
Impression: Increased asymmetric opacification involving the left lung compatible with worsening multifocal pneumonia.
